H0.text: what nfl player has the most nfl rings. Joe Montana

H1.text: what nfl player has the most nfl rings. Terry Bradshaw

H2.text: what nfl player has the most nfl rings. Peyton Manning

H3.text: what nfl player has the most nfl rings. Tom Brady

A4.text: Brady has seven Super Bowl titles, the most of any player and more than any NFL franchise.

A5.text: Brady became the player with the most championships in NFL history and tied Otto Graham for the most league championships in professional football history by a player at seven.
